channel.title: How to make something do a gfx when equipted?

item.title: How to make something do a gfx when equipted?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

Please someone help me make this cape do this gfx when equipted. O and make it need 99 to equip.

if(playerLevel[3] >= 99)
stillgfx(444, absY, absX);
item id is 7623

Please someone tell me where to add this and fix it up for me PLEASE!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make something do a gfx when equipted?
